forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 58, with temperatures falling to around 54 in the afternoon. West northwest wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 44. North wind around 6 mph.

weather_report:
Downtown San Francisco basks in a gentle afternoon glow, the horizon stretching wide under a sweeping blue sky, absent of the usual fog that often defines the landscape. The crisp air, brisk and invigorating, carries a hint of salt from the nearby bay but offers no whispers of mist or haze today. Instead, sunshine penetrates every corner of the city, bathing the iconic buildings and bustling streets in warmth, as temperatures gracefully settle around the mid-50s. A soft wind rustles through the trees, playful yet composed, creating a perfect blend of comfort and clarity.

As evening approaches, the forecast promises a clear sky, inviting anyone to lace up their shoes and wander along city trails or perhaps take a leisurely stroll by the waterfront. Layering is key for the evening chill, with a light jacket or sweater to complement the dusk air that drapes the world in a cool embrace. Tonight, the air will settle into the low 40s, creating the ideal backdrop for an intimate gathering around a cozy fire pit with friends or a quiet evening enjoying a good book at a local café. Embrace the beauty of the day and evening; it’s a time for moments that linger gently, much like the golden blush of the setting sun.
